subject: College Athletics
Football
lead_paragraph: Bobby Petrino landed his first major recruit for Arkansas — Ryan Mallett, the former Michigan quarterback. Mallett has transferred to Arkansas and will have three years of eligibility after sitting out the 2008 season. Mallett, a 6-foot-7 freshman who played in 11 games for the Wolverines, left Michigan after Rich Rodriguez replaced the retiring Lloyd Carr as the coach.
